p2_update_orphans

p2_update_orphans.Rd

Run p2_update_email for all emails changed since since using Tessitura data at least as fresh as freshness

Usage

p2_update_orphans(freshness = 0, since = Sys.time() - 7200, test_emails = NULL)

Arguments

freshness

datediff, passed on to tessilake functions, defaults to 0 (refresh all data)

since

datetime, passed on to tessi_changed_emails, defaults to the last two hours.

test_emails

character, if set then all updates are dry runs except for emails matching test_emails
